00084 class optSigmoidFit

00099         void init(Model& model)

00109         double optimize(Model& model, ErrorFunction& errorfunction, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00110         {
00111                 SigmoidModel* pSig = dynamic_cast<SigmoidModel*>(&model);
00112                 if (pSig == NULL) throw "[optSigmoidFit::init] invalid model";
00113 
00114                 SIZE_CHECK(input.ndim() == 2);
00115                 SIZE_CHECK(target.ndim() == 1);
00116 
00117                 double a, b, c, d, e, t, d1, d2;
00118                 double oldA, oldB, diff, scale, det, err;
00119                 double value, p;
00120                 double lambda = 0.001;
00121                 double olderr = 1e100;
00122                 int pos = 0;
00123                 int neg = 0;
00124                 int i, ic = input.dim(0);
00125 
00126                 SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(1) == 1);
00127                 SIZE_CHECK(target.dim(0) == ic);
00128 
00129                 for (i=0; i<ic; i++) if (target(i) > 0.0) pos++; else neg++;
00130                 double A = 0.0;
00131                 double B = log((neg + 1.0) / (pos + 1.0));
00132                 double lowTarget = 1.0 / (neg + 2.0);
00133                 double highTarget = (pos + 1.0) / (pos + 2.0);
00134                 Array<double> pp(ic);
00135                 pp = (pos + 1.0) / (pos + neg + 2.0);
00136                 int count = 0;
00137                 int it;
00138                 for (it=0; it<100; it++)
00139                 {
00140                         a = b = c = d = e = 0.0;
00141                         for (i=0; i<ic; i++)
00142                         {
00143                                 t = (target(i) > 0.0) ? highTarget : lowTarget;
00144                                 d1 = pp(i) - t;
00145                                 d2 = pp(i) * (1.0 - pp(i));
00146                                 value = input(i, 0);
00147                                 a += d2 * value * value;
00148                                 b += d2;
00149                                 c += d2 * value;
00150                                 d += d1 * value;
00151                                 e += d1;
00152                         }
00153                         if (fabs(d) < 1e-9 && fabs(e) < 1e-9) break;
00154                         oldA = A;
00155                         oldB = B;
00156                         err = 0.0;
00157                         while (true)
00158                         {
00159                                 det = (a + lambda) * (b + lambda) - c * c;
00160                                 if (det == 0.0)
00161                                 {
00162                                         lambda *= 10.0;
00163                                         continue;
00164                                 }
00165                                 A = oldA + ((b + lambda) * d - c * e) / det;
00166                                 B = oldB + ((a + lambda) * e - c * d) / det;
00167                                 err = 0.0;
00168                                 for (i=0; i<ic; i++)
00169                                 {
00170                                         p = 1.0 / (1.0 + exp(A * input(i) + B));
00171                                         pp(i) = p;
00172                                         err -= t * mylog(p) + (1.0 - t) * mylog(1.0 - p);
00173                                 }
00174                                 if (err < 1.0000001 * olderr)
00175                                 {
00176                                         lambda *= 0.1;
00177                                         break;
00178                                 }
00179                                 lambda *= 10.0;
00180                                 if (lambda >= 1e6)
00181                                 {
00182                                         // Something is broken. Give up.
00183                                         break;
00184                                 }
00185                         }
00186                         diff = err - olderr;
00187                         scale = 0.5 * (err + olderr + 1.0);
00188                         if (diff > -1e-3 * scale && diff < 1e-7 * scale)
00189                                 count++;
00190                         else
00191                                 count = 0;
00192                         olderr = err;
00193                         if (count == 3) break;
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 pSig->setParameter(0, A);
00197                 pSig->setParameter(1, B);
00198         }
00199 
00201         double mylog(double x)
00202         {
00203                 if (x < 1.38389652673673753e-87)
00204                         return -200.0;
00205                 else
00206                         return log(x);
00207         }
00208 };
